mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE STATUS = 'PENDING'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPORT(TARGET_TYPE, TARGET_ID, REPORTER_ID, REASON, DETAIL) VALUES(#{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{reporterId}, #{reason}, #{detail})
mapper.select: SELECT r.TARGET_ID AS boardId, b.TITLE AS title, b.WRITER_ID AS userId, COUNT(*) AS reportCount, MAX(r.CREATED_AT) AS lastReportedAt FROM TBL_BOARD b, TBL_REPORT r WHERE b.BOARD_ID = r.TARGET_ID AND r.TARGET_TYPE = #{type} AND r.STATUS = 'PENDING' GROUP BY r.TARGET_ID, b.TITLE, b.WRITER_ID
